column2: Simple hold with elbow sling. Finger tips should just touch the string.
Push front end forward towards target and hold.
Move string end back and forth slightly. Movement comes from elbow
Push front end towards target, then relax back and push forward again
Stay at full draw as long as possible. Try to maintain form and posture. Shaking is fine but come down once collapsing
Push front end as far forward as you can and hold
Pump both ends to move quickly.
Using sight pin expand off front keeping sight pin on fixed point
Expand on back end, while maintaining front end fixed on aiming point
